summary.span: 定义 中内容单元格的流内容元素。

span.span: A flow content element that defines a cell of content within a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素是直接承载内容的唯一表元素。The element is the only table element that directly hosts content. 存在 (、 、和) 的其他表元素， 用于定义表的结构特性。Other table elements (, , , and ) exist to define the structural attributes of a table. 元素可以承载一个或多个派生自的流内容元素 。 elements may host one or more flow content elements deriving from . 的有效内容元素 包括：Valid content elements for a include: - - - - - Collection 类提供用于处理对象集合的功能 。The collection class provides facilities for working with collections of objects. > [!NOTE] > 的内容没有内置的数据绑定 。There is no built in data binding for the contents of a . 向添加数据绑定功能的最简单的选项 是将绑定的数据置于 中， 如下所示：``The simplest option for adding data binding functionality to a is to put a data bound in your like this: ``

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness BorderThickness { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.BorderThickness : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置元素的边框粗细。

span.span: Gets or sets the border thickness for the element.

value.span: 一个 结构，指定要应用的边框量（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: A structure specifying the amount of border to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认值为统一粗细，即零 (**0.0**)。

span.span: The default value is a uniform thickness of zero (**0.0**).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 要统一应用于所有四个厚度尺寸的单个值的字符串表示形式。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，的值等效于的 `"10"` 值 `"10,10,10,10"` 。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四个有序值的字符串表示形式， 对应于 "左"、"上"、"右" 和 "下"，按此顺序排列。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 这四个值必须用逗号分隔;不允许使用空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 例如，"5，10，15，20" 会导致 "内容" 左侧有5个像素的边框，内容的上边为10个像素，内容右侧有15个像素的边框，内容的下方有20个像素的边框。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of border to the left of content, 10 pixels of border above content, 15 pixels of border to the right of content, and 20 pixels of border below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* *UniformThickness*描述的值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` (默认) 为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in`为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如， `"1in"` 在所有方向上都提供均匀的边框。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform border of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* *IndependentThickness*描述的值，每个独立值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` (默认) 为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in`为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 可以在一个或多个值中混合或省略单元说明符。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 () 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_BordersXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_bordersxaml)] 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![屏幕快照：蓝色、1/1/4 的边框](~/add/media/block-borders.png "屏幕快照：Block 周围 1/4 英寸的蓝色边框")![Screenshot: Blue, 1/4inch border around Block](~/add/media/block-borders.png "Screenshot: Blue, 1/4inch border around Block") 下面的示例演示如何以 编程方式设置属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_Borders](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_borders)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_Borders](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_borders)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 元素中内容流的相对方向。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the relative direction for flow of content within a element.

value.span: 枚举的一个成员，它指定相对流动方向。

span.span: A member of the enumeration specifying the relative flow direction.

value.span: 获取此属性将返回当前有效的流动方向。

span.span: Getting this property returns the currently effective flow direction.

value.span: 设置此属性将导致 元素的内容重新沿指示的方向流动。

span.span: Setting this property causes the contents of the element to re-flow in the indicated direction.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容的流动方向通常对应于所表示语言的原始流方向。The flow direction of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented. 希伯来语和阿拉伯语提供自然从右到左的语言的示例。Hebrew and Arabic provide examples of languages that naturally flow from right-to-left. 英语、德语和俄语提供了从左到右自然流动的语言的示例。English, German, and Russian provide examples of languages that naturally flow from left-to-right. > [!NOTE] > 此属性的值不会自动更改，与操作系统所使用的语言相匹配。The value of this property is not automatically changed to match the language used by the operating system. 如果需要使用不同的值，则默认值为 ，则必须自行指定。If you need to use a different value then the default of , you must specify it yourself. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 () 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirectionXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_flowdirectionxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何以 编程方式设置属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_flowdirection)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_flowdirection)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double LineHeight { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.LineHeight : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置各行内容的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of each line of content.

value.span: 一个双精度值，指定行的高度（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: A double value specifying the height of line in device independent pixels.

value.span: 必须等于或大于0.0034且等于或小于160000。

span.span: must be equal to or greater than 0.0034 and equal to or less then 160000.

value.span: 值 (等效于属性值 "Auto" ) 导致自动根据当前的字体特征确定行高。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of "Auto") causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改此值不会更改关联文本的高度;相反，它更改包含文本的行的高度。Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; rather, it changes the height of the line that contains the text. 除了此属性，中的行布局还 受其属性的影响 。In addition to this property, the layout of lines in a is affected by its property. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 等于或大于 `0.0034` 且等于或小于的值的字符串表示形式 `160000` 。String representation of a value equal to or greater than `0.0034` and equal to or less then `160000`. 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 如上所述的*双精度*值， (只不过 `Auto`) 后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 、 `cm` 和 `pt` 。A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` (默认) 为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in`为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm`为厘米;1cm = = (96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt`为点;1pt = = (96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px 自动Auto 使行高由当前字体特征自动确定。Causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics. 等效于的属性值 。Equivalent to a property value of . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeightXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_lineheightxaml)] 下图显示了上一个示例的呈现效果。The following figure shows how the previous example renders. ![屏幕快照：FlowDocument LineHeight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheight.png "屏幕快照：FlowDocument LineHeight")![Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheight.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight") 下图显示了在的默认设置下，该示例的呈现方式 = 。The following figure shows how the same example renders with the default setting of =. ![屏幕快照：FlowDocument LineHeight 默认值](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheightdefault.png "屏幕快照：FlowDocument LineHeight 默认值")![Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight default](~/add/media/flowdocument-lineheightdefault.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument LineHeight default") 下面的示例演示如何以 编程方式设置属性。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeight](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_lineheight)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_LineHeight](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_lineheight)]

summary.span: 获取或设置元素的填充厚度。

span.span: Gets or sets the padding thickness for the element.

value.span: 一个 结构，它指定要应用的边距量（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: A structure specifying the amount of padding to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认值为统一粗细，即零 (**0.0**)。

span.span: The default value is a uniform thickness of zero (**0.0**).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 要统一应用于所有四个厚度尺寸的单个值的字符串表示形式。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，的值等效于的 `"10"` 值 `"10,10,10,10"` 。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 非限定值以与设备无关的像素度量。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四个有序值的字符串表示形式， 对应于 "左"、"上"、"右" 和 "下"，按此顺序排列。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 这四个值必须用逗号分隔;不允许使用空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 例如，"5，10，15，20" 将在内容左侧填充5个像素，在内容右侧填充10个像素，在内容右侧填充15个像素，在内容的下方填充20个像素。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of padding to the left of content, 10 pixels of padding above content, 15 pixels of padding to the right of content, and 20 pixels of padding below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* *UniformThickness*描述的值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` (默认) 为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in`为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如， `"1in"` 在所有方向上都提供1英寸的统一填充。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform padding of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* *IndependentThickness*描述的值，每个独立值后跟以下单元说明符之一： `px` 、 `in` 。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` (默认) 为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in`为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 可以在一个或多个值中混合或省略单元说明符。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置元素的 属性 () 。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element ().
